content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Yi-Nuo Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Hello Yi-Nuo Wang, I'm glad you like the apartment. I am open to offers for this prime piece of real estate. Let's see if we can strike a deal that satisfies us both.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you, Mister Schmidt. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Could you provide me with an initial price for the apartment?
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: As a seasoned landlord, I am aware of the worth of my property. I am looking for an annual rent of €1000 a month. I am willing to hear your offer, but I must warn you, I am not one to easily budge on price.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Your initial price is quite high, Mister Schmidt. I would like to propose a lower monthly rent. How about €800 a month?
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I appreciate your offer, Yi-Nuo Wang, but it is far too low for this prime location. I am willing to negotiate, but not at such a significant discount. I would suggest €950 a month, which is already a considerable reduction from my initial offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: €950 is still quite high, Mister Schmidt. I am a student and have a limited budget. I would like to propose €850 a month, which I believe is a fair price considering the unfurnished state of the apartment and my student status.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I understand your situation, Yi-Nuo Wang, but €850 a month is simply too low for this apartment's location and size. It is a prime piece of real estate in the city center, close to all important facilities. I am willing to reduce the rent to €900 a month, which I believe is a fair price for both parties.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: €900 is more reasonable, Mister Schmidt, but I would still like to negotiate a bit lower. I am a responsible tenant who is willing to maintain the apartment well. How about €875 a month? This would be a long-term arrangement with a reliable tenant.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I hear your argument, Yi-Nuo Wang, but €875 a month is still not enough for this prime piece of real estate. A reduction to €875 a month would mean a significant loss for me. I am willing to reduce the rent to €890 a month, which I believe is a fair price for both parties.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: €890 is closer to my budget, Mister Schmidt, but I would still like to propose €880 a month. This would be a long-term, stable arrangement with a tenant who values this apartment's location and is willing to maintain it well. I hope this offer is more acceptable to you.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I appreciate your commitment, Yi-Nuo Wang, but €880 a month is still not enough for this prime piece of real estate. A reduction to €880 a month would mean a significant loss for me. I am willing to reduce the rent to €885 a month, which I believe is a fair price for both parties.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: €885 is very close to my budget, Mister Schmidt. I am willing to accept this price and commit to a long-term lease. I am sure we can both benefit from a stable and respectful tenant-landlord relationship. TERMINATE
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China
